title: The Ever Expanding Audio Collection
description: A large collection of royalty free loops / songs / audio cues and sound effects. This pack will have FREE UPDATES FOREVER!
longDescription:
Welcome to The Ever Expanding Audio Collection


When Purchasing this collection you are getting a large collection of ROYALTY FREE Loops / Songs / Audio Cues and Sound Effects which also has FREE UPDATES FOREVER!

   

Treat yourself to a large amount of audio in many genres which range from:

  • Action - Adventure - Fantasy - Epic - Ambient - Calm - Sad - Emotional - Beautiful - Casual - Fun - Campy - Hiphop - EDM - Horror - Thrilling - Mystery - Detective - Noir - Scifi - Space - Electronic - Short Audio Cues and Sound Effects


CLICK HERE TO LISTEN TO THE DEMO TRACKS PLAYLIST


You will find 9 different playlists which represent the above genres listed.


File Count:

Upon the initial release 2.0 the file count is 260 Audio Files and 260 Cue Files with 9 Folders which contain many genre types.


As we release FREE UPDATES the file/ folder count will increase over time.


You can find a complete list of the audio files in this audio collection at:

CLICK HERE FOR A COMPLETE LIST OF THE AUDIO FILES
technicalDetails:
Audio File Extensions Included:

.WAV


BitRate:

The audio files in this pack have a Bit Rate of 44,100hz


Audio Types:

  • Loops:
  • When you see an audio file that has a Suffix of _Loop, This means that it will seamlessly loop when used.


  • Fade:
  • When you see an audio file that has a Suffix of _Fade, _FadeIn or Fade_Out, This means that this audio file can be treated as a non looping song.


  • Cue:
  • When you see an audio file that has a Suffix of _Cue, this is the unreal Cue format.


  • All Else:
  • If any of the other audio files you see in this collection do not have a suffix mentioned above it will either be a Sound Effect, Short Audio Cue or Song.



Important Information:

Supported Platforms:

This Audio Collection is supported on Mac/Windows 32-bit/Windows 64-bit/Linux/Android/Gear VR/HTML 5/iOS/Oculus/Playstation 4/Steam VR/Xbox One


Documentation:

Click the link below to read the documentation of the audio collection

CLICK HERE FOR DOCUMENTATION


Support:

If for any reason you have an issue and need support please reach out to us at SpaceHQContact@gmail.com
